radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Ultrasonography of the right upper quadrant
radiographic_examinations.findings: 3-cm complex cystic lesion in the right hepatic lobe; no biliary dilatation, ascites, portal-vein or hepatic-vein thrombosis, or radiographic evidence of cirrhosis.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis without contrast enhancement
radiographic_examinations.findings: 3.6-cm air-containing cavity in the posterior right hepatic lobe consistent with a hepatic abscess; no biliary dilatation, hepatic-vein or portal-vein thrombosis, ascites, or radiographic evidence of cirrhosis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased white-cell count from 32,000 to 34,700 per cubic millimeter.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the head without contrast enhancement
